file_content.text: Hurry up and go in. I don't want anyone to catch me like this.
I've got the package you're expecting.
What are...? Oh! Thank the Emperor, or--someone. I'm almost out.
Are you taking over for Numen? I--I saw they got him last night. He really didn't like the delousing.
You'd better get out of here before they throw you in, too.
Not to confuse you, but that's kind of our goal.
Yeah, about that....
Let us inside.
So, Captain, how do you want to play this one? Prisoner routine again? Ice fever?
Why are you looking at me like that?
Numen's going to save himself by giving up his buyers. You've got to let me in so I can keep him quiet.
[Lie] I need to warn you.
Oh, no! They'll kill me if they find out I'm getting stims from the resistance.
Half our unit will be executed!
If he spills, he puts me out of business, too. Work with me.
Then let me in!
I just told you how to fix it.
Stop whining.
You don't have to get snippy about it.
Okay. Just... make sure he didn't tell anyone, okay? My dad thinks I'm doing really good with this job.
You mean like this?
I'll show you "executed"...
You get me in to free Numen, I can set you up with a lot of stims. Free.
Can I ask for a favor?
I--I couldn't. They'd kill me if they found out.
Of course, they'd already kill me for talking to you. And buying stims. And sometimes saying "fail to the Empire" under my breath when we renew our oaths of service....
All right, give them to me. And tell Numen he owes me.
Open the door! And keep it quiet, or it's your head.
Let me in or else.
Okay! Don't wave that thing around.
I'm opening it. Just don't shoot! I never wanted this job!
There.
You know, the Republic could use a nice... dim... corrupt... on second thought, stick with what you've got.
You seem like a good guy.
Just try to keep this quiet, okay? I don't want to get in trouble.
Also, loud noises give me a real headache....
If I get in there and alarms start blaring, I'm coming after you.
Don't change your mind.
I won't say a word. I swear!
Just don't hurt me!
I suggest you get very very lost now.
Get out of here.
Um... okay. I'll, ah, find somewhere to hide. Just don't kill me!
Imperial territory. No trespassing.
